thread.title: Winter storm - beware
thread.title_full: Winter storm - beware - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elodia S
title: Winter storm - beware
text:
We were exited to take the family to visit NYC and had our whole trip planned out- Mother Nature had other plans. Our flights were cancelled and even though we tried everything, train, plane, automobile we could not get there. Called la Quinta in the evening to cancel and they said - oh well we will still charge you!
I told them about everything being cancelled and all they could say is- we are very strict about cancellations, you should have called at 3pm! Hello! We didn't know our flights were going to be cancelled. I called them at 6:30 as soon as I knew. Mind you this was the day before, they could have absolutely filled the room.
Anyway- they could have worked with us but chose not to.
